name: Mesh Guess
description:
Mesh Guess is an Android app where you try to guess a scrambled model before it is revealed!

You can also play "Mesh Scramble" the Two Player mode where the first player tries to scramble a model beyond recognition in twenty seconds and the second player tries to guess it.

Created based off what was going to be the 2020 Train Jam theme: "Hindsight"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi there!

This is the beta release of Mesh Guess so thanks for having an early interest!

If you want to provide feedback you can leave a comment below or DM me on Twitter :)

Best of luck guessing!
